about_the_game:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA Peach Beach Splash in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

Tracklist:
1. D-D-D-ing! Water Pinball
2. Tropical Athletics
3. Ocean! Sparkles, Sparkles, and More Sparkles!
4. Water Sprays on a Deserted Island
5. Ayame's Shopping Corner
6. Hot Springs! A Great Jet Tale
7. Water Drop and Dance of Cherry Blossom Flowers
8. Water Battle IN THE SNOW!
9. Carribean Pirate Ship
10. Hanzō Ninja Room
11. To the Winners
12. Bon Appetit Kitchen Resort
13. Wet with a Bit of Sweet @ Sour -Hanzō-
14. Midsummer Hyped Splash - Crimson Squad-
15. Let's PARTY PEOPLE! -Gessen-
16. Merrily Explosive Water Guns! -Hebijo-

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
